Header: Four employees of a Fuel Station attacked by robbers (Video)
Content: Four employees of a Fuel Station in the Mora-gaha-hena area in Horana have sustained injuries due to an attack carried out by a group of robbers. Five individuals who had arrived at a Fuel Station in Mora-gaha-hena had attacked the employees of the Fuel Station located in the center of the Mora-gaha-hena town, with clubs. They have robbed 130,000 rupees from the Fuel Station. The attack had been recorded on CCTV cameras fixed at the Station. The injured employees were rushed to the Horana base hospital. The Manager of the Station who sustained serious injuries was transferred to the national hospital.
